name: GatewayIntents
description: OptionSet that represents Discord Gateway intents to opt into specific event deliveries.
usage: Use GatewayIntents when identifying with the gateway. Example: `let intents: GatewayIntents = [.guilds, .guildMessages, .messageContent]`
notes: Only request `messageContent` when necessary; some intents require privileged access from Discord (e.g., `guildMembers`).
